title: Stay
lyrics:
Everybody's getting more time with me than you
Yeah, I've been working real hard
And you have been working too
Well this Friday night
I'll tell you what we're gonna do
We gonna pack our bags

We don't have to leave the room



We can drive to Memphis

Listen to the blues

Catch a train to New Orleans

And on to Baton Rouge

As long as we're together

We can stay right here

Counting all the stars in the middle of nowhere

Yeah, we can get away

But we can't stay



I wonder what the hell we're saving our money for

If we can't buy time with each other anymore

Come Monday morning

I'll tell you what we gonna do

We're gonna call in sick

And do whatever we want to



We can go to California

Be something that we're not

We can fly to Colorado

Maybe smoke a little pot

As long as we're together

We can stay right here

Counting all the starts

Maybe drink a couple beers

Yeah, we can get away

But we can't stay



We can go to New York City

Dance in Central Park

We can go on down to Austin

And drink in all the bars

We can go up to Chicago

Down to Cristal Beach

Man it doesn't really matter to me

Yeah, we can get away

But we can't stay

Yeah, we can get away

But we can't stay

Oh, we can get away

But we can't stay
